title: Amistad National Recreation Area: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         NPS Photo / Brian Storm   History & Culture Learn about the people and places that make up our past.  Nature Learn about the plants and animals, geology, ecosystems, and other natural features found in the park.  Science & Research Apply for a research permit.  Education Plan a class visit.  Kids & Youth Become a Junior Ranger.  Management Park planning, laws and policies, and managing resources.
